entries.name: entity_expansion_limit()
entries.desc: Get the entity expansion limit. By default the limit is set to 10000.

entries.name: entity_expansion_limit=( val )
entries.desc: Set the entity expansion limit. By default the limit is set to 10000.

entries.name: entity_expansion_text_limit()
entries.desc: Get the entity expansion limit. By default the limit is set to 10240.

entries.name: entity_expansion_text_limit=( val )
entries.desc: Set the entity expansion limit. By default the limit is set to 10240.
